indenticator.showIndentGuide.description: Whether to highlight the indent of the block enclosing the current line

indenticator.color.dark.description: Color of the indent marker for dark themes

indenticator.color.light.description: Color of the indent marker for light themes

indenticator.width.description: Width of the indent marker in pixels

indenticator.style.description: Line style of the indent marker

indenticator.inner.showIndentGuide.description: Whether to highlight the indent of the block enclosed by the current line

indenticator.inner.color.dark.description: Color of the inner indent marker for dark themes

indenticator.inner.color.light.description: Color of the inner indent marker for light themes

indenticator.inner.width.description: Width of the inner indent marker in pixels

indenticator.inner.style.description: Line style of the inner indent marker

indenticator.showCurrentDepthInStatusBar.description: Whether to display the current indent depth on the statusbar

indenticator.showHover.description: Whether to display the hover near the indent line, or minimum number of lines in current indent block to activate the hover.

indenticator.hover.highlight.description: Wether to highlight the contained code block when hovering the indent line. If activated, the peeked content will be shown at top or bottom of the block, otherwise it will be shown at cursor position.

indenticator.hover.peekBack.description: Lines before the current indent to be shown on hover

indenticator.hover.peekForward.description: Lines after the current indent to be shown on hover

indenticator.hover.trimLinesShorterThan.description: Remove lines from the hover at the beginning and end that have less characters than this

indenticator.hover.peekBlockPlaceholder.description: Block placeholder to be written between peeked lines

indenticator.inner.showHover.description: Whether to display the hover near the inner indent line, or minimum number of lines in current indent block to activate the hover.

indenticator.inner.hover.highlight.description: Wether to highlight the contained code block when hovering the inner indent line. If activated, the peeked content will be shown at top or bottom of the block, otherwise it will be shown at cursor position.

indenticator.inner.hover.peekBlockPlaceh.description: Block placeholder to be written between peeked lines for the hover of the inner indent
